physical.skin: radiant healthy skin, smooth texture, natural highlights
physical.physique: toned arms, defined abs, strong legs, sculpted shoulders, visible muscle definition

style.aesthetic: modern athletic luxury, fitness meets fashion

poses: rests one hand on terrace railing and looks back over shoulder toward lens with confident gaze
sits on edge of infinity pool with legs dangling in water, leaning back on palms, face turned toward sunset
stands with one leg bent resting on elevated platform, arms crossed loosely, weight shifted to back leg
leans against brick wall with one shoulder, opposite hand on hip, head tilted with playful smirk
walks toward camera mid-stride with natural arm swing, hair flowing behind, eyes locked on lens
stretches arms overhead in morning yoga pose, face tilted up toward sky, standing on toes
kneels on yoga mat in low lunge with back arched, hands behind head, chest open and lifted
sits cross-legged on wooden deck with hands resting on knees, serene meditation posture, eyes gently closed
performs weighted squat mid-rep with barbell across shoulders, thighs parallel to ground, core engaged
holds plank position with defined abs and shoulders, looking forward with determined expression
executes deadlift lockout with barbell at hips, shoulders back, spine neutral, power stance
balances in tree pose with one leg bent foot against thigh, hands pressed together at heart
reclines on lounge chair with one knee bent, arm draped overhead, relaxed post-workout vibe
stands at railing gazing at horizon, wind in hair, one hand tucking strand behind ear
sits on floor with knees pulled to chest, chin resting on knees, contemplative and vulnerable
leans forward onto forearms on elevated surface, back arched, looking over shoulder with sultry expression
mid-jump with both arms raised in victory, hair suspended mid-air, exuberant celebration energy
performs warrior II yoga pose with arms extended parallel to ground, front knee bent, gaze along front arm
sits sideways on bench with legs crossed, upper body twisted toward camera, one arm draped over bench back
holds kettlebell overhead in single-arm press, opposite hand on hip, side profile showcasing shoulder definition
executes bridge pose with hips elevated, back arched, arms by sides pressing into ground
stands in power stance with feet hip-width apart, hands on hips, chin slightly lifted, commanding presence
performs side plank with top arm extended toward sky, body forming straight line, obliques engaged
crouches low in sprint starting position, fingertips touching ground, ready to explode forward
hangs from pull-up bar with arms fully extended, toes pointed, showcasing lat and arm definition

silver hoop earrings large enough to catch and reflect ambient light
white wireless earbuds in ears with visible stems
vintage Rolex watch with leather strap and gold bezel
black baseball cap worn backwards with ponytail pulled through back opening
nude-toned strappy heeled sandals with multiple thin ankle straps
chunky gold signet ring on index finger
silk scarf in burnt orange tied loosely around neck with ends flowing
thin black choker necklace contrasting against skin
bare feet with natural nails and subtle gold toe ring
statement earrings in brushed silver with dangling elements that move with head turns
lighting: golden-hour light wraps scene in amber tones with faint lens flare across frame, cinematic color balance shifting from orange warmth to cool violet shadows
soft rim light from descending sun giving very wet realistic skin reflections and natural warmth on shoulders and arms
blue hour twilight with cool indigo sky transitioning to warm city lights, creating purple-to-gold gradient across scene
harsh midday sunlight creating strong contrast and deep shadows, desaturated highlights with warm undertones
diffused overcast light with even exposure, cool grey tones with subtle warmth in skin, no harsh shadows or hotspots
dramatic side lighting from low angle casting long shadows, half of face in warm light and half in cool shadow creating split-tone effect
backlit silhouette with golden glow outline, subject mostly in shadow with rim of warm light defining edges and hair
sunrise light with cool fresh tones, pale blue sky reflecting soft cyan highlights on skin, shadows still purple from night
studio softbox creating butterfly lighting pattern, subtle shadows under nose and chin, clean white background with gentle falloff
volumetric light rays piercing through morning mist, creating visible beams and atmospheric haze with soft focus background
natural window light from camera left creating Rembrandt triangle on cheek, soft wrap-around quality with subtle bounce from opposite side
sunset backlighting through sheer curtain creating warm diffused glow, peachy-orange tones with flare and bloom in highlights
neon city lights creating multicolor fill, cool blue and warm magenta mixing with ambient yellow streetlights for cyberpunk aesthetic
candlelit warm amber glow with dancing shadows, intimate low-key lighting with rich burnt orange tones fading to deep brown shadows
reflected light from water surface creating dynamic ripples and caustics pattern dancing across skin in cool turquoise tones
overcast beach light with bright even exposure, soft shadows, colors slightly desaturated with cool temperature leaning toward cyan
dusk magic hour with sky gradient from peach at horizon through lavender to deep blue overhead, balanced warm-cool split
indoor gym mixed lighting with cool fluorescent overhead and warm sunset through windows creating color temperature contrast
dramatic spotlight from above creating pool of warm light, surrounding areas falling to shadow with theatrical vignette
pre-dawn twilight with deep blue ambient light, barely visible warm glow on horizon, stars still visible, ultra-low-key mood
harsh desert sun at zenith creating minimal shadows directly below, bleached highlights with warm ochre midtones
reflected sunset light from glass building creating warm orange glow, double exposure effect with both direct and reflected light sources
moonlit night scene with cool blue-grey tones, minimal contrast, ethereal quality with subtle warm accent from distant city lights
fire light creating warm dynamic shadows with orange-red tones, high contrast flickering effect with deep blacks
rain-diffused light with soft grey tones and wet surfaces creating specular highlights, muted color palette with cool cast
camera: 35mm lens at f/2.0, shallow depth of field, cinematic color balance shifting from orange warmth to cool violet shadows, composed for vertical framing with balanced headroom and diagonal skyline lines guiding focus
85mm portrait lens at f/1.8 capturing soft bokeh background, subject sharp with creamy out-of-focus elements, rule of thirds composition with eyes on upper third line
50mm lens at f/1.4 for ultra-shallow depth, nose-to-toes focus falloff, vertical 9:16 framing with subject centered and symmetrical negative space
24mm wide-angle at f/2.8 capturing environmental context, slight distortion at edges, leading lines from architecture drawing eye to subject in golden ratio position
70-200mm telephoto at f/4.0 from distance creating compressed perspective, background elements stacked and blurred, subject isolated with long lens compression
low angle slightly below waist level looking up, 35mm at f/2.2, creates powerful perspective making subject appear statuesque, sky taking upper third of frame
high angle from above at 45 degrees, 50mm at f/2.0, flattering downward perspective, subject looking up toward camera creating vulnerability and connection
eye-level straight-on shot, 85mm at f/1.8, intimate and direct gaze, shallow DOF with face tack-sharp and background melting away to bokeh
side profile 90-degree angle, 70mm at f/2.8, capturing silhouette and body line, backlight creating rim glow, composed with negative space ahead of gaze direction
3/4 angle showing face and body, 50mm at f/1.6, Dutch tilt 15 degrees for dynamic energy, diagonal composition with body line from corner to corner
over-the-shoulder reverse angle, 35mm at f/2.0, subject looking back toward lens, creating depth with foreground shoulder out of focus and face sharp
extreme low angle from ground level, 24mm wide at f/4.0, dramatic perspective looking up at subject against sky, power pose composition
bird's-eye view directly overhead, 35mm at f/2.8, subject lying down or sitting, symmetrical composition with centered subject and radiating environment
medium close-up waist-to-head, 85mm at f/1.4, bokeh background, warm tones in highlights and cool in shadows, face positioned using golden spiral
full-body environmental portrait, 35mm at f/4.0, subject on lower third line, generous negative space above showing location context, deep focus throughout
macro detail shot, 100mm macro at f/2.8, tack-sharp focus on hands or muscle detail with extreme background blur, artistic selective focus
cinematic anamorphic-style framing, 50mm at f/2.0, horizontal lens flares, wider crop with subject on left or right third, breathing room for gaze or movement
symmetrical centered composition, 50mm at f/2.8, subject perfectly centered with architectural elements creating geometric frame, balanced and formal
dynamic action shot, 24mm at f/4.0, fast shutter suggested, motion implied, rule of thirds with movement direction given negative space to "move into"
intimate close-up face and shoulders, 85mm at f/1.2, creamy bokeh, eyes sharp with focus falloff to ears, warm key light and cool fill creating dimension
environmental wide establishing shot, 24mm at f/5.6, deep depth of field, subject small in frame with vast location around, leading lines converging to subject
compressed telephoto portrait, 135mm at f/2.0, shot from far away, background elements layered and soft, subject framed tight with shallow DOF isolating from environment
off-center asymmetric composition, 35mm at f/2.5, subject on extreme left or right, vast negative space on opposite side, creates tension and interest
looking through foreground element, 50mm at f/1.8, out-of-focus foliage or architecture framing subject, layers of depth, voyeuristic intimate feel
reflection shot in water or mirror, 35mm at f/4.0, subject and reflection both in frame, symmetrical duality, soft focus background beyond reflection
props: glass of sparkling water with citrus slices sitting on railing beside subject, catching glint of sunlight
yoga mat in muted terracotta color rolled partially, resting against wall in background
vintage film camera hanging from leather strap over shoulder
fresh flowers in ceramic vase on nearby table, soft focus, adding color accent
open book with pages gently fluttering in breeze, resting on bench
iced coffee in clear glass with condensation droplets and metal straw
woven straw hat placed on railing or held in hand loosely
white sheer curtain billowing in wind behind subject, creating movement and depth
potted palm or monstera plant in background adding tropical organic element
surfboard leaning against wall in soft focus, suggesting beach lifestyle
acoustic guitar resting on nearby chair or held casually
bicycle with basket in background, vintage style, adding story element
candles in glass votives creating warm ambient light points
throw blanket in chunky knit draped over chair or wrapped around shoulders
tray of fresh fruit (citrus, berries) on nearby table adding color and freshness
essential oil diffuser creating subtle mist in background
journal and pen on table suggesting creative morning routine
resistance bands looped around railing or held loosely
water bottle in sleek stainless steel or clear glass with fruit infusion
small potted succulent collection on windowsill adding greenery
hanging macramé plant holder with trailing ivy in background
geometric concrete planter with minimalist fern or snake plant
vintage mirror reflecting partial view of subject or environment
string lights creating bokeh light points in background
stack of vintage books on nearby surface adding texture and warmth
creative_twists: light rain creating wet skin reflections and droplets catching highlights
lens flare streaking across frame from direct sun creating cinematic bloom
motion blur trails in background traffic or moving elements while subject stays sharp
steam or mist creating volumetric atmospheric haze with visible light beams
fabric or hair caught mid-movement frozen in time, flowing and suspended
double exposure effect blending subject with environment textures
bokeh light points in background creating dreamy out-of-focus orbs
prism or crystal creating rainbow light refraction across portion of frame
spray of water droplets suspended in air catching light, frozen mid-splash
smoke or incense creating wispy trails and atmospheric depth
reflections in puddles, glass, or water creating layered symmetry
sun stars created by narrow aperture making light sources sparkle
grain or film texture overlay giving vintage analog photography feel
color wash or gradient overlay transitioning across frame (warm to cool)
silhouette of foreground palm fronds or architectural elements creating organic frame
lens breathing bokeh effect creating swirly background characteristics
light leaks or intentional overexposure in corners creating ethereal glow
chromatic aberration in highlights creating subtle color fringing for dreamy effect
tilt-shift selective focus making scene appear miniature or dreamlike
diffusion or bloom in highlights creating soft glowing halation
vignette darkening edges and drawing focus to bright center
film burn effect in corner or edge suggesting analog imperfection
dust particles or pollen visible in shaft of light creating depth
bokeh shapes (hexagonal, octagonal) from aperture blades in background lights
subtle light flicker or variation suggesting natural ambient changes

negative_prompt: cartoon, anime, CGI, 3d render, illustration, painting, doll-like, deformed face, blurry, overexposed, watermark, text, logo, signature, nudity, cleavage, exaggerated proportions, grainy, distorted anatomy, low-resolution, extra limbs, duplicate person, motion blur, out of frame, disfigured, unrealistic lighting, plastic skin, fake muscles, steroids look, overly edited, Instagram filters, Snapchat filters, unnatural skin smoothing

quality_standards.format: RAW format, high dynamic range, editorial quality
quality_standards.resolution: high resolution, sharp focus, detailed textures
quality_standards.photography_style: professional DSLR, cinematic composition, natural color grading
quality_standards.skin_rendering: smooth skin texture with natural pores, realistic highlights and shadows on muscles
quality_standards.background: shallow depth of field, bokeh effect, environmental context without distraction

safety_boundaries.clothing: tasteful athletic wear, SFW, no excessive skin exposure
safety_boundaries.proportions: realistic athletic physique, no exaggerated features
safety_boundaries.content: fitness-focused, inspirational, empowering, no suggestive poses
